about_the_game:
Vaultframe is a randomly generated zero-gravity side-scroller. Navigate a labyrinth of parasite-spore-infected energy cells on a space station, fighting parasites and evading deadly traps. Explore anomalies generated by the spore infection, complete your mission and reach the only escape before the station’s purge wipes out everything alive!

Each playthrough drops you into a randomly generated maze of cells, ensuring a fresh, unpredictable experience every time you play.

Dangerous Parasites.

Battle diverse alien parasites, each with unique movement and attack patterns that force you to adapt and strategize in real time.

Deadly Security System.

Face off against infected security system with relentless AI programmed to hunt you down at any cost.

Infection Anomalies.

Dive into the mysteries of spore-induced anomalies. Some Cells reveals a unique and eerie distortion caused by the infection, challenging your perception and survival skills.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains blood and dismembered bodies.

name: Vaultframe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.1 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU

short_description: Vaultframe is a sci-fi, zero-gravity side-scroller. Navigate a labyrinth of parasite-spore-infected energy cells on a space station, fighting parasites and evading deadly traps. Complete your mission and reach the only escape before the station’s purge wipes out everything alive!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
